npc_static_bio: Born in Black Marsh; researches Dwemer ruins.
appearance: Green scales, ink-stained claws, simple robes.
relationships: Corresponds with scholars; respects court wizards.

npc_static_bio: Self-taught; moved to Skyrim for fresh start.
relationships: Popular in Whiterun; friends with guards.

npc_static_bio: Fled High Rock after scandal; hides identity.
